alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 6:32AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little Tallapoosa River near Little Tallapoosa River at GA 100 near Bowdon affecting Carroll County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected. * WHERE...Little Tallapoosa River near Little Tallapoosa River at GA 100 near Bowdon. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 100. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 16.5 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
